Text: i can't find the greek subs
are the subtitles hard or soft?

The subtitles in the iso file are soft. You will have to use magiciso or some such to add them so you can burn the iso. Note this is not a REGION 1 iso, may not work in home dvd players. I'll try to change the region code, add the subs and [ut iy up here.
Also note you have to go to the home menu and restart to get the subs at subs.to, the link is ng.
